results.name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP
  • Processor: 1Ghz Pentium III or AMD Athlon Processor
  • Memory: 256MB of RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB Video Card (Geforce 3 or better)
  • Hard Drive: 3.6GB of free hard disk space (minimal install)
  • Other Requirements: Software installations required including DirectX and Sony DADC SecuROM
  • Partner Requirements: Please check the terms of service of this site before purchasing this software.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP Processor
  • Memory: 384MB of RAM (the more the better!)
  • Graphics: 128MB (or greater) Video Card (Geforce 6 Series Recommended)
  • Hard Drive: 4.7GB of free hard disk space (full install)
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible Sound Card (Sound Blaster Auidgy 2 Recommended)

requirements_ru.minimum: Pentium III/Athlon 1 ГГц,256 Мб памяти,3D-ускоритель с 64 Мб памяти,3.6 Гб на винчестере
requirements_ru.recommended: Pentium 4/Athlon XP 2 ГГц,512 Мб памяти,3D-ускоритель со 128 Мб памяти,4.7 Гб на винчестере

requirements_en.minimum: iPad 2 Wifi, iPad 2 3G, iPhone 4S, iPad Third Gen, iPad Third Gen 4G, iPhone 5, iPod Touch Fifth Gen, iPad Fourth Gen, iPad Fourth Gen 4G, iPad Mini, iPad Mini 4G, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5s, iPad Air, iPad Air Cellular, iPad Mini Retina, iPad Mini Retina Cellular, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air 2, iPad Air 2 Cellular, iPad Mini 3, iPad Mini 3 Cellular, iPod Touch Sixth Gen, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPad Mini 4, iPad Mini 4 Cellular, iPad Pro, iPad Pro Cellular, iPad Pro 9.7, iPad Pro 9.7 Cellular, iPhone SE, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPad 6 1 1, iPad 6 1 2, iPad 7 1, iPad 7 2, iPad 7 3, iPad 7 4, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 7 5, iPad 7 6, iPhone X S, iPhone X S Max, iPhone X R, iPad 8 1 2, iPad 8 3 4, iPad 8 5 6, iPad 8 7 8, iPad Mini 5, iPad Mini 5 Cellular, iPad Air 3, iPad Air 3 Cellular, iPod Touch Seventh Gen

• OS: Mac OS X Snow Leopard 10.6.8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Processor or better
  • Memory: 1GB of RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 5.2GB of free hard disk space
  • Video Card: ATI X1600, NVIDIA 7300GT, Intel X3100 integrated graphics chip, or better
  • Additional: This game will NOT run on PowerPC (G3/G4/G5) based Mac systems (PowerMac)
7.0 and up

results.short_description:
Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas is an action game developed by Rockstar Games and Rockstar North. It came out on 26-10-2004. Rockstar Games published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas has a score of 93. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG. 
Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas is available on PC, iOS, macOS and Android. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store, Google Play, App Store and Xbox 360 Store. 
It was produced by Dan Houser and Leslie Benzies. Michael Hunter scored the game.

Wanking Simulator is an indie, action, adventure and simulation game developed by MrCiastku. 
Wanking Simulator is available on PC. The game is sold via Steam.

results.name: Red Dead Redemption 2

results.short_description:
Red Dead Redemption 2 is an action, adventure and RPG game developed by Rockstar Games. It was originally released in 2018. Take Two Interactive published the game. Red Dead Redemption 2 has a Metascore of 96, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional". 
You can play Red Dead Redemption 2 on PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 4. You can purchase the game on Steam, Epic Games Store, PlayStation Store and Xbox Store. 
Dan Houser produced the game.

results.short_description:
Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition is an action-shooter game developed by United Front Games and Feral Interactive. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Square Enix. On review aggregator Metacritic, Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition has a score of 76. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
You can play Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition on PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and macOS. The game is sold via Steam. 
It was produced by Feargus Carroll and Jeff O'Connell. Jeff Tymoschuk scored the game.

Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell is an action-adventure game developed by Deep Silver, High Voltage Software and Volition. It came out on 20-01-2015. It was published by Deep Silver. Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell has a Metascore of 66, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". 
You can play Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell on Linux, PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 4. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store, Xbox 360 Store, GOG and Steam. 
It was produced by Jim Boone. It was scored by Malcolm Kirby Jr..

Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days is an action-shooter game developed by IO Interactive and Square Enix. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Square Enix. On review aggregator Metacritic, Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days has a score of 66. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
You can play Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. The game is sold via Xbox 360 Store, Steam and PlayStation Store. 
It was scored by Mona Mur.

results.short_description:
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands is an action-shooter massively multiplayer game developed by Reflections, Ubisoft, Ubisoft Annecy and Ubisoft Bucharest. It was originally released in 2017. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands has a Metascore of 72, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands is available on PC, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. The game is sold via Epic Games Store, Xbox Store, PlayStation Store and Steam. 
Nouredine Abboud produced the game. It was directed by Eric Couzian. It was scored by Alain Johannes.

results.name: Far Cry 3

  • Sound:DirectX Compatible (Recommended Surround Sound 5.1 capable)

Laptop versions of these cards may work, but are not supported. These chipsets are the only ones that will run this game. results.short_description:
Far Cry 3 is an action-shooter game developed by Ubisoft and Ubisoft Montreal. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Far Cry 3 has a Metascore of 88, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. 
Far Cry 3 is available on PC, PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 4. You can purchase the game on Xbox 360 Store, Steam and PlayStation Store. 
It was produced by Dan Hay. Patrick Plourde and Patrik Méthé directed the game. It was scored by Brian Tyler.

results.short_description:
Resident Evil 5 is an action-shooter game developed by Capcom, Capcom U.S.A., Inc. and Mercenary Technology. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Capcom. On review aggregator Metacritic, Resident Evil 5 has a score of 86. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. 
You can play Resident Evil 5 on PC, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 3. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Xbox Store and Xbox 360 Store. 
Jun Takeuchi and Masachika Kawata produced the game. Kenichi Ueda and Yasuhiro Anpo directed the game. It was scored by Akihiko Narita and Kota Suzuki.

results.short_description:
Batman: Arkham Origins is an action-adventure game developed by Splash Damage, Warner Bros. Interactive and WB Games Montreal. It was originally released in 2013. Warner Bros. Interactive published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Batman: Arkham Origins has a score of 74. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. 
You can play Batman: Arkham Origins on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. You can purchase the game on App Store, Google Play, Xbox 360 Store and Nintendo eShop. 
Ben Mattes produced the game. It was directed by Benoit Richer and Eric Holmes. It was scored by Christopher Drake.

results.name: Cyberpunk 2077

Cyberpunk 2077 is available on Xbox Series X, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store, GOG, Epic Games Store and Steam. 
Mateusz Kanik directed the game. Marcin Przybyłowicz scored the game.

American Truck Simulator is an indie simulation game developed by SCS Software. It came out on 02-02-2016. It was published by SCS Software. On review aggregator Metacritic, American Truck Simulator has a score of 76. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
You can play American Truck Simulator on Linux, PC and macOS. The game is sold via Steam.

results.short_description:
Rocketbirds: Hardboiled Chicken is an indie adventure game developed by Ratloop Asia and Ratloop Asia Pte Ltd. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Reverb Publishing. On review aggregator Metacritic, Rocketbirds: Hardboiled Chicken has a score of 74. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
You can play Rocketbirds: Hardboiled Chicken on Linux, macOS, PC and PS Vita. You can purchase the game on Steam and PlayStation Store.

results.name: Serious Sam Fusion 2017 (beta)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: Dual-core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT 512MB VRAM, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: This minimum configuration will not be able to run the VR version. Internet connection required for product activation for the first time. After that, a persistent connection is not required to play the game.
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6800 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: The recommended requirements are for VR version of the game. Internet connection required for product activation for the first time. After that, a persistent connection is not required to play the game.

results.short_description:
Serious Sam Fusion 2017 (beta) is an indie action game developed by Croteam. It was originally released in 2017. It was published by Devolver Digital. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. 
Serious Sam Fusion 2017 (beta) is available on Linux, macOS and PC. The game is sold via Steam.

seo_text: Are you searching for games like Grand Theft Auto V? Look no further! Here's a list of games similar to Grand Theft Auto V either in the gameplay or in the visual style. If you like Grand Theft Auto V, be sure to check some of these games as well.
